title: 31 Times Demi Lovato Looked Absolutely Flawless

components.text: 38 Times Demi Lovato Looked Absolutely Flawless
She has rocking style on and off stage.
Demi Lovato leaves the Waldorf Astoria Hotel in Berlin on Sept. 11, 2015.
Demi Lovato leaves Capital Radio Studios in London on Sept. 10, 2015.
Demi Lovato arrives at BBC Radio One in London on Sept. 9, 2015.
Demi Lovato in London on Sept. 8, 2015.
Demi Lovato leaves NRJ radio in Paris on Sept. 7, 2015.
Demi Lovato arrives at *Jimmy Kimmel Live* in Los Angeles on Aug. 31, 2015.
Demi Lovato attends the MTV Video Music Awards at Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles on Aug. 30, 2015.
Demi Lovato attends the new Samsung Galaxy S6 edge+ and Galaxy Note5 launch event in Los Angeles on Aug. 18, 2015.
Demi Lovato gets dinner at Zuma on July 1, 2015, in New York City.
Demi Lovato visits Z100 to debut her new single, "Cool for the Summer," at Gansevoort Park Avenue on July 1, 2015, in New York City.
Demi Lovato visits SiriusXM Studios in New York City on July 1, 2015.
Demi Lovato visits SiriusXM Studios in New York City on June 25, 2015.
Demi Lovato leaves Katsuya in Hollywood in Los Angeles on June 17, 2015.
Demi Lovato attends DigiFest NYC 2015 in New York City on June 6, 2015.
Demi Lovato leaves her hotel in New York City on May 28, 2015.
Demi Lovato posts [this photo](https://instagram.com/p/1nINpgOKir/) to Instagram on April 18, 2015, with the caption, "Phuckkk yo thigh gap.... ?????? #latinacurves."
Demi Lovato on *Good Morning America* in New York City on March 12, 2015.
Demi and her fuzzy friend Buddy visit *Extra* at Universal Studios Hollywood on March 3, 2015, in Universal City, California.
Demi rocks a little red dress at the second annual unite4:humanity at the Beverly Hilton Hotel on Feb. 19, 2015, in Los Angeles, California.
Demi arrives at the Roc Nation Grammy brunch on Feb. 7, 2015, in Beverly Hills, California.
Demi performs at the 93.3 FLZ's Jingle Ball 2014 at Amalie Arena on Dec. 22, 2014, in Tampa, Florida.
Demi rocks tartan on the red carpet before at 93.3 FLZ's Jingle Ball 2014 at Amalie Arena on Dec. 22, 2014, in Tampa, Florida.
Demi performs during 103.5 KISS FM's Jingle Ball 2014 at Allstate Arena on Dec. 18, 2014, in Chicago, Illinois.
Demi shines in a shimmery dress at the 103.5 KISS FM's Jingle Ball on Dec. 18, 2014, in Chicago, Illinois.
Demi attends the 2014 Hot 99.5 Jingle Ball at Verizon Center on Dec. 15, 2014, in Washington, DC.
Demi performs onstage during HOT 99.5's Jingle Ball 2014 at the Verizon Center on Dec. 15, 2014, in Washington, D.C.
Demi slays in sequins onstage at 101.3 KDWB's Jingle Ball 2014 at Xcel Energy Center on Dec. 8, 2014, in St Paul, Minnesota.
Demi pops in at KIIS FM's Jingle Ball 2014 at the Staples Center on Dec. 5, 2014, in Los Angeles, California.
Demi looks tough during her performance at Now! 99.7's Triple Ho Show at SAP Center on Dec. 3, 2014, in San Jose, California.
Demi whips her hair onstage at O2 Arena on Nov. 28, 2014, in London, United Kingdom
Demi looking chic near the Eiffel Tower on Nov. 22, 2014, in Paris, France.
Demi carries out goodies from the Chanel Rue Cambon store on Nov. 22, 2014, in Paris, France.
Demi opens for Enrique Iglesias at Palais Omnisports de Bercy on Nov. 21, 2014, in Paris, France.
Demi arrives at NRJ radio station on Nov. 21, 2014, in Paris, France.
Demi Lovato makes a dramatic exit from the Royal Variety Performance at the Palladium Theatre on Nov.13, 2014, in London, England.
Demi Lovato looks hot in pink at the Vevo CERTIFIED SuperFanFest held at Barker Hangar on Oct. 8, 2014, in Santa Monica, California.
Demi stuns on the red carpet at the 2014 MTV Video Music Awards on Aug. 24, 2014, in Inglewood, California.
